Welcome

I'm a Ph.D. researcher at Virginia Tech, focused on software engineering research, security in Android, IoT and Linux systems, and machine learning applications. I am being advised by Professors Haining Wang (Chair) and Randy Marchany (Co-chair).

With over 10 years of experience as a Mobile Engineer, Tech Lead, and Software Architect, I enjoy building tools that make systems faster, more secure, and easier to understand while writing clean, reliable code that lasts.
